alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Camden; Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 12 at 6:29AM EST until March 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 43 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA CLAY DUVAL FLAGLER NASSAU PUTNAM ST. JOHNS IN NORTHERN FLORIDA ALACHUA BRADFORD MARION UNION IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA BRANTLEY CAMDEN GLYNN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ANASTASIA, ANTHONY, ARLINGTON, ATKINSON, BAKERSVILLE, BELLAIR, BOSTWICK, BURBANK, CARRAWAY, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORS INLET, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, DURBIN, FERNANDINA BEACH, FRUIT COVE, GAINESVILLE, GAINESVILLE AIRPORT, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HILLIARD, HOBOKEN, HORTENSE, JACKSONVILLE, JEKYLL ISLAND, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE BUTLER, LAKESIDE, MIDDLEBURG, NAHUNTA, NEW RIVER, NEWNANS LAKE, NORMANDY, OCALA, OCALA AIRPORT, OCEANWAY, ORANGE PARK, ORTEGA, PALATKA, PALM COAST, PALM VALLEY, PONTE VEDRA BEACH, RATLIFF, RAYBON, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. SIMONS, STARKE, SWITZERLAND, THALMANN, WAYNESVILLE, WEIRSDALE, AND YULEE.
